.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AndroidHttpClient extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Org.Apache.Http.Client.IHttpClient, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Implementation of the Apache that is configured with reasonable default settings and registered schemes for Android.

remarks.para:
Implementation of the Apache that is configured with reasonable default settings and registered schemes for Android. Don't create this directly, use the factory method.
context.setAttribute(ClientContext.COOKIE_STORE, cookieStore);
This client processes cookies but does not retain them by default. To retain cookies, simply add a cookie store to the HttpContext:

Docs.summary: Compress data to send to server.

remarks.para: Compress data to send to server. Creates a Http Entity holding the gzipped data. The data will not be compressed if it is too short.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the minimum size for compressing data.

remarks.para: Retrieves the minimum size for compressing data. Shorter data will not be compressed.

Docs.param: the entity whose content should be read
Docs.summary: Gets the input stream from a response entity.

remarks.para: Gets the input stream from a response entity. If the entity is gzipped then this will get a stream over the uncompressed data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static long ParseDate (string dateString);
.method public static hidebysig int64 ParseDate(string dateString) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the date of the given HTTP date string.

remarks.para: Returns the date of the given HTTP date string. This method can identify and parse the date formats emitted by common HTTP servers, such as , , , and .

Docs.exception: if dateString is not a date or of an unsupported format.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
